name: MiniBob
description:
MiniBob tells a story about technology which we invited in our lives, our home. It raises the question which consequences this can have. The player gets a chance to step into the perspective of the small robot; MiniBob. As MiniBob you must take care of your household; Claire and Billy. After reading some positive reviews about you, they decided to buy you, and welcomed you into their home. Remember, you must make them happy, that is your purpose. So complete you’re tasks and get to know your household. Good luck!

Features

  • Combining fun and realism, by making ethical decisions.
  • Explore the house, and uncover hidden secrets.
  • Complete tasks to make your household happy!
